data.title: Charlotte Bonaparte Gabrielli
data.meta_description: Charlotte Bonaparte Gabrielli - Free download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. Charlotte Bonaparte Gabrielli was a French Napoleonic princess, the eldest daughter of Lucien Bonaparte. She married Italian prince Mario Gabrielli in 1815 and had eight children. As Princess Gabrielli, she hosted a literary salon in Rome and remained loyal to Napoleon's memory. She was known for her gossip and outspoken personality.
